verbose_text: By preventing binding of bile acids to FXR of small intestinal epithelial cells, there is decreased generation of FGF19, decreased transport via the portal circulation of that moiety to the liver, decreased activity of signal transducer and activator of transcription-3, an inhibitor of SREBP-1c expression, and thereby increased activity of SREBP-1c by a mechanism possibly independent of the hepatocyte FGF liver receptor-4 (XREF_FIG - latter steps not shown).
